body_html:
By the way, if we want to parse the parameters and get values with key. Calling FLAGS.__getattr__("channels") directly will throw this exception.

ERROR:root:Trying to access flag --channels before flags were parsed.
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./main.py", line 25, in <module>
    FLAGS.__getattr__("channels")
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/absl/flags/_flagvalues.py", line 488, in __getattr__
    raise _exceptions.UnparsedFlagAccessError(error_message)
absl.flags._exceptions.UnparsedFlagAccessError: Trying to access flag --channels before flags were parsed.

body:
By the way, if we want to parse the parameters and get values with key. Calling `FLAGS.__getattr__("channels")` directly will throw this exception.

```
ERROR:root:Trying to access flag --channels before flags were parsed.
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./main.py", line 25, in <module>
    FLAGS.__getattr__("channels")
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/absl/flags/_flagvalues.py", line 488, in __getattr__
    raise _exceptions.UnparsedFlagAccessError(error_message)
absl.flags._exceptions.UnparsedFlagAccessError: Trying to access flag --channels before flags were parsed.
```
